DOC.brief_summary: As study investigate efficacy safety daily dose paroxetine 15 20 mg treatment premature ejaculation
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Paroxetine Daily Doses 15 mg 20 mg Treatment Premature Ejaculation
DOC.detailed_description: Randomized , double blind , placebo control , prospective parallel trial . Men premature ejaculation use Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders , fourth edition , text revision criterion least 6 month , intravaginal ejaculatory latency time ( IELT ) ≤ 3 minute . Three treatment compare : placebo , 15 mg 20 mg paroxetine 12 week .
